awards: [{'title': '1st Prize Edward Mace Award for Highest achieving student in a Dissertation 2017', 'description': 'A study looking at whether the much-discussed repeal of the Human Rights Act 1998 would have repercussions on media outlets and journalists, and whether these would be positive or negative. \n\nThrough the categorisation of cases from the European Court of Human Rights that have had an impact on media rights and the critical assessment of their effect, the study analyses how the common law approach has been affected by the Human Rights Act in areas like privacy, freedom of expression and protection of sources.', 'issuer': 'City, University of London', 'date': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}]

position_groups:
[{'company': {'id': 35447844, 'name': 'NEAR (Network for Empowered Aid Response)', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQGijBzo2WNDWw/company-logo_400_400/0/1590050505724?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=V4TUI22p9EUyAj8ckRKiu7nAzq-PoTT7P1eHYyv5qOk', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/network-for-empowered-aid-response/', 'employees': {'start': 2, 'end': 10}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Remote', 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'NEAR (Network for Empowered Aid Response)', 'description': '• Co-led a research project exploring the barriers to the localisation of humanitarian research; the project was a collaboration with the Feinstein International Center at Tufts University
• Co-authored a report based on 42 interviews with national and local researchers in the Global South, which identified and analysed the challenges that they face and opportunities for their increased participation
• Drafted research briefs and blog articles on the localisation of humanitarian research
• Organised and facilitated three roundtable discussions between donors and Global South researchers
• Moderated a webinar on the localisation of research, bringing together donors and Global South experts
• Developed a guidance document for best practices to assess NEAR Secretariat and members’ engagement in future research projects and partnerships
• Secured a collaboration with the International Humanitarian Studies Association; worked with it to redesign its database of humanitarian researchers to increase the visibility of Global South research institutions', 'title': 'Research Coordinator', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 2979928, 'name': 'Global Insight', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQHc-Ax6Xdh3nQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1614030485715?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=qERr_gZIG7b3dD4nbXKKq8fskUmLfOdk-SJBuNWFKVc', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/globalinsight/', 'employees': {'start': 11, 'end': 50}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}}, 'company': 'Global Insight', 'description': '• Child trafficking and child marriage thematic lead for a Plan US-sponsored study on child trafficking in rural areas in India and Nepal 
• Remotely managed fieldwork, coordinated project implementation budget and timelines, and developed safeguarding protocols
• Responsible for qualitative data analysis, report writing, and presentation of research findings', 'title': 'Research Associate ', 'employment_type': 'Self-employed'}]}, {'company': {'id': 68887149, 'name': 'Cyrus R. Vance Center for International Justice', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQEHHfkCirD6wg/company-logo_400_400/0/1601569036365?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=2LJdDnBA3LakEomXXh3MmUkSycClabKuToNjeyLn-jw', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/vancecenter/', 'employees': {'start': 11, 'end': 50}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Sierra Leone', 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'company': 'Cyrus R. Vance Center for International Justice', 'description': '• Planned and implemented a research and advocacy project on the causes and consequences of women’s detention in Sierra Leone
• Designed the research tools and hired, trained and coordinated a team of five research assistants
• Interviewed 80 imprisoned women as well as formerly incarcerated women, prison staff, legal professionals and government officials 
• Authored an 80-page report recommending the government of Sierra Leone to develop gender-responsive alternatives to incarceration; the report was featured in national and international media outlets, including BBC radio and VICE News
• Prepared a guide to conducting participatory research on women in prison, based on the lessons learned during the field research
• Co-wrote two articles on Covid-19 and prisons, published in a journal edited by Antigone and the European Prison Observatory
• Co-drafted an NGO submission for the OHCHR’s Universal Periodic Review on key criminal justice issues in Sierra Leone, including the death penalty and arbitrary arrests
• Designed a national media and advocacy strategy aimed at producing criminal justice policy reforms
• Spoke on a panel discussing women’s incarceration in Africa at a side event of the Forum on the Participation of NGOs of the African Commission on Human and People’s Rights
• Developed and facilitated gender-sensitivity workshops with police officers
• Led workshops with women prisoners’ rights organisations on the global trends in women’s incarceration', 'title': 'Lead Researcher', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Defence for Children International Sierra Leone ', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Freetown', 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'company': 'Defence for Children International Sierra Leone ', 'description': '• Planned and led a research project in border areas in Sierra Leone, Liberia and Guinea to evaluate the impact of a multi-partner project funded by the Fund for Global Human Rights aimed at decreasing child trafficking in the Mano River Region
• Conducted in-depth interviews with law enforcement actors and child survivors of human trafficking
• Produced a 50-page evaluation report and presented findings to key child protection actors from West Africa
• Edited press releases and assisted with the production of other evaluation reports for international donors
• Co-authored a report on child sexual exploitation in Sierra Leone, which was selected as a case study by the African Child Policy Forum', 'title': 'Policy and Research Consultant', 'employment_type': 'Self-employed'}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Defence for Children International – Sierra Leone', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Sierra Leone', 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'company': 'Defence for Children International – Sierra Leone', 'description': '• Drafted position papers on domestic child trafficking and child marriage laws and on the national ban on pregnant girls attending school, which were used for policy reform advocacy', 'title': 'Legal Intern', 'employment_type': 'Internship'}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Samar Abbas', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'company': 'Samar Abbas', 'description': '• Conducted legal research for Samar Abbas, a barrister working at 39 Essex Chambers in London', 'title': 'Research Associate', 'employment_type': None}]}]
